detectors.description:
AvodronToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AvodronToken.sol#81-86) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AvodronToken.sol#83)
detectors.markdown:
[AvodronToken.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AvodronToken.sol#L81-L86) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AvodronToken.sol#L83)

detectors.description:
AvodronToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AvodronToken.sol#88-94) can write the state variable array at will

	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AvodronToken.sol#91)

detectors.description:

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AvodronToken.sol#14)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- AvodronToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AvodronToken.sol#81-86)

	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AvodronToken.sol#16)
